title: Never Throw Away Santa Claus
sub_head: Getting rid of an old ornament landed me in small-claims court.
body:
Lakewood, Ohio
I got in trouble for throwing out Santa. He was in a storage locker in the basement of one of my apartment buildings. I thought he was junk. I didn’t know he was a “vintage Avon Santa on bicycle ornament from my grandmother,” but that came out in court.
